resources.string: Room Finder uses the schedules created at the beginning of the semester to determine when a room is not being used by any classes.
Room Finder does not provide live updates and sometimes a room may be booked by clubs, societies or other organizations which Room Finder doesn\'t take into account.
How do I use Room Finder?

The Home page has a list of current open rooms and you can choose to search by Room or Time from the navigation menu. By clicking on an open room you will be able to see when the next class is and where the building is located on the map.
